menu_items.name: CHOOSE YOUR CUT | USDA PRIME BEEF
menu_items.detail:
The Belvedere Room features hand cut prime beef butchered in-house, then aged in duck fat, thyme and rosemary. This creates a unique steak experience we call “The Padre Way”

8 OZ. TENDERLOIN : 42
10 OZ. TOP SIRLOIN BASEBALL CUT | 32
16 OZ. BONE OUT RIBEYE | 48
14 OZ. NEW YORK STRIP LOIN | 38
SANTA CAROTA BEEF | MP
Santa Carota is Bakersfield’s own original carrot-fed beef. This creates a juicer flavored beef that is high in beta-carotene. We invite you to taste this specialty beef straight from the rancher to you.
